text: Please enter your answers using only numbers (no letters or special symbols).
Make sure to answer every question, leaving a question blank will be considered as an incorrect answer.
You will have a limited time to complete the quiz, so please do your best to answer all questions in a timely manner.
The quiz will automatically submit when time is up, so make sure to answer as many questions as possible before time runs out.
You can only submit your answers once, so make sure to double-check your answers before submitting.
Please do not refresh or leave the page during the quiz, as it may affect your progress or answers.
Please do not use external resources or help during the quiz, as it may result in an unfair advantage.
Each question will only have one correct answer, so please read the question and all options carefully before answering.
Please do not share the quiz questions or answers with others, as it may affect the integrity of the quiz for future users.
Enjoy the quiz and have fun!
